title: Troubleshoot In-Room Wi-Fi
description: A guest calls the front desk reporting that they cannot connect to the Wi-Fi in their room.

tasks.description: Provide the guest with the correct Wi-Fi network name and password.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gives the correct login credentials.

tasks.description: If the issue persists, remotely check the status of the Wi-Fi access point serving the guest's room.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent's diagnostic tool shows the access point is online and functioning correctly.

tasks.description: Guide the guest to restart their device, which often resolves connectivity issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a simple troubleshooting step that resolves the guest's problem.
